scripts.secrets:
[ -f "secrets" ] && echo "secrets exists" || echo "export POSTGRES_USERNAME=snack
export POSTGRES_PASSWORD=pack
export PGADMIN_USERNAME=snack@pack.com
export PGADMIN_PASSWORD=pack" > secrets
scripts.api: source secrets && yarn workspace api dev
scripts.site: source secrets && yarn workspace site dev
scripts.all: yarn install && yarn secrets && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail  "source secrets && yarn docker" "source secrets && yarn dev"
scripts.docker:clean: [ "$(docker ps -a | grep sp-db)" ] && docker rm sp-db -f && [ "$(docker ps -a | grep sp-pg)" ] && docker rm sp-pg -f
scripts.clean:all: yarn docker:clean && yarn docker:clean:data && yarn clean
